results.title: Republican Leaders Stand Behind Santos After His Indictment
results.abstract: Speaker Kevin McCarthy has signaled that the New York congressman will be allowed to continue to serve even after being indicted on several federal charges.

media.caption: With a slim majority in the House and a fight over the debt ceiling looming, Speaker Kevin McCarthy cannot afford to lose Representative George Santos’s vote.

results.byline: By Maggie Shipstead and Anthony Cotsifas
results.title: What Survives in the Atacama Desert?
results.abstract: In Chile, a writer takes a road trip through one of the world’s driest places — a landscape that preserves remnants of the dead.

media.caption: The Tara Salt Flat sits at 14,000 feet in the northern Chilean Andes, at the eastern edge of the Atacama Desert. Some 250 miles to the west lies the Pacific Ocean and, in between, a vast, near rainless interior.

results.title: Tucker Carlson, Still Under Contract at Fox, Says He Will Start Show on Twitter
results.abstract: His claim, made on Twitter, suggested that his negotiations to reach an amicable separation with the network had broken down.

results.title: Scientists Unveil a More Diverse Human Genome
results.abstract: The “pangenome,” which collated genetic sequences from 47 people of diverse ethnic backgrounds, could greatly expand the reach of personalized medicine.

media.caption: The new pangenome reference resembles a corn maze, with alternative paths and side trails that allow scientists to explore a broader range of the genetic diversity found in people the world over.

results.adx_keywords: Murders, Attempted Murders and Homicides;Poisoning and Poisons;Fentanyl;Books and Literature;Richins, Kouri;Park City (Utah);Utah
results.title: She Wrote of Grief After Her Husband Died. Now She’s Charged in His Murder.
results.abstract: Kouri Richins wrote a children’s book to help her three sons process their father’s sudden death, she said. Prosecutors said this week that she poisoned him with a lethal dose of fentanyl.

media.caption: Kouri Richins wrote the children’s book, “Are You With Me?”, about dealing with grief after her husband died.
